bioghist.p: Helen Hutchinson Woodroofe (1922-1989) served as editor of the Pennsylvania Genealogical Magazine from 1976-1982 and 1985-1988, and was the compiler of A Genealogistâ€™s Guide to Pennsylvania Records. She lived in Philadelphia and was married to Philip Benson Woodroofe.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of genealogical research materials on the Samuel Allen (1700-1779) family of Philadelphia and allied families such as McCroskry and Rippey. Materials include: family charts and datasheets on individual family members; photocopies from county histories; a published family history titled Allen Family Records by J. Montgomery Seaver (1929); notes; copies of primary sources related to various family members; and a small amount of correspondence related to the research.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
